title: Bloomberg Markets: Romahi on Alternative Beta

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Yazann Romahi\u0010Chief Investment Officer of J.P. Morgan Asset Management’s Quantitative Beta Strategies investment platform. \u0010Discussing using Alternative Beta within an overall portfolio from the from the JPMorgan ETF Symposium in NYC.
